body_text:
Continuation of #384
Adds menu to UI to allow user to customize what columns are shown/hidden, and saves the configuration locally.

Adds Column Actions, Column Reducer, and Column Selectors (+ tests for all)
Adds CheckboxList, ColumnMenu, DropdownMenu, RecipeFilters components
Refactors RecipeList component
Uses localForage to save/load column state locally
Compares loaded columns against those hardcoded in the app - if there's a mismatch, the column config is thrown out and the default is shown. This will prevent users from seeing broken columns if we end up changing the column setup later.
Sets up ground work for more advanced filtering in upcoming PRs

title: Customizable Columns
body:
Continuation of #384

Adds menu to UI to allow user to customize what columns are shown/hidden, and saves the configuration locally.

- Adds Column Actions, Column Reducer, and Column Selectors (+ tests for all)
- Adds CheckboxList, ColumnMenu, DropdownMenu, RecipeFilters components
- Refactors RecipeList component
- Uses localForage to save/load column state locally
- Compares loaded columns against those hardcoded in the app - if there's a mismatch, the column config is thrown out and the default is shown. This will prevent users from seeing broken columns if we end up changing the column setup later.
- Sets up ground work for more advanced filtering in upcoming PRs
